quote1.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quote1.author: Steve Jobs

quote2.text: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
quote2.author: Steve Jobs

quote3.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quote3.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote4.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quote4.author: Aristotle

quote5.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quote5.author: Tony Robbins
